title: The Cow and it's relatives
brief_description: The domestic cow and bull, and a very young calf are shown in their usual farm surroundings. The Indian humped cow, the zebu and the Yak of Tibet (also domesticated animals) the American bison or buffalo are shown; and finally, African antelopes of various kinds - the kudo, the nyala, the giant eland, the roan antelopes and the addax antelopes are presented briefly. The antelope is, biologically speaking, a close relative to the cow.
